Articles.Content:
Hi

I have KSP 1.11.1.

My game gets stuck on the loading screen with the little orbits on the bottom right (the one where you load the craft). For some reason the planets in the orbits are moving very smoothly; normally when I load craft it gets stuck for about 5 seconds before spinning up and then the craft loads.

Any ideas to what might be happening? It's really frustrating because I am no longer able to fly any of my craft.

Thanks

For anyone to help, you will need to post logs.  See this post for details:

If you have the Steam version, you can verify the installed game files via Steam which should fix anything missing or corrupted and would hopefully fix your problem.
As @Cavscout74 said, we'll need log files before we can do more.   There are many reasons KSP might be loading slowly.   Without the logs, we'll just be guessing.
